datasets.name: ds_auth_kpis
datasets.query: SELECT total_transactions, auth_3ds_usage_pct, approval_rate_pct, avg_fraud_score FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_executive_kpis LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_merchant_auth
datasets.query: SELECT merchant_segment, transaction_count, approval_rate_pct, auth_3ds_usage_pct FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_merchant_segment_performance ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
